website_summaries.verdict: A basic choice for anyone wanting to add some functional lighting to their ceiling fan. Goes well with a number of design styles.
pros: Stands out for its range of light coverage due to the adjustable can lights
Easy to install when following the instructions
cons: Exposed can lights can get hot when used for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Pull the on/off chain multiple times
customer_reviews.text: The somewhat low rating is merely because of the instructions. The kit itself is really nice looking on a modern look fan. No more difficult than usual to install. However, I don't recall it saying on the box or in the instructions that there are lighting options. Originally thought I had a defective unit because only two lights came on. By accident a friend pulled the chain again and the other two lights came on. A third pull, we were getting the hang of it now, turned on all four lights. The product itself is good, just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan Light Kit

customer_reviews.title: Oil Rubbed Bronze Kit came with chrome pull chain :(
customer_reviews.text: This light kit is great - it fit my non-Emerson brand fan, was easy to install, good quality and looks nice. I downgraded the stars because the oil-rubbed bronze kit I received came with a chrome colored pull chain. It stands out and now I have to go back and try to paint it to match the bronze color. If it wasn't for that, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ZumaLun

customer_reviews.title: Not advertised correctly
customer_reviews.text: This is not advertised as a ceiling fan light kit, but that is what it is. It is not what we were needing and are still waiting on the company for directions to return it.

product_meta.title: Emerson Ceiling Fans LK36BS 4 Spot Mesh Light Kit for Ceiling Fans
product_meta.description:
Color:Brushed SteelOur Brushed Steel finish 4 Spot Mesh Ceiling Light Fixtures are a modern twist to a traditional design, offering spotlight positioning and a stylish, industrial look to your indoor or outdoor Emerson ceiling fans. These 4 ceiling light fixtures measure to be 10-inches wide and 7-inches high, and have a Damp Location rating for use with Emerson outdoor ceiling fans in covered areas like patios and verandas. This light kit includes 4, 13-watt medium base compact fluorescent bulbs and has been rated for use with 4, 60-watt incandescent bulbs.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Four-spot mesh light fixture for damp location outdoors or indoors.
